description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class for authentication responses, encapsulating JWT token and user information.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: DTO representing authentication response data, including JWT token, user ID, email, and full name.

methods.name: AuthResponse(String token, Long userId, String email, String fullName)
methods.description: Constructor for initializing an AuthResponse object with token, user ID, email, and full name.
